scenario.name: SIP VMR Certification Scenario
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field2]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "[field0]" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] To: "[field0]" <sip:[field0]@[field2]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0]@[field2]:[local_port]>;expires=1800 Expires: 1800 Content-Length: 0 Supported: path

INVITE sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field2]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp-[field0] <sip:[field0]@[field2]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag09[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: sip:[field0]@[field2]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] Supported: timer Session-Expires: 1800;refresher=uac Min-SE: 1800
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [field2] s=- c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [field2] t=0 0
